title: Everglades National Park: Boat Launch Fees
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes     Boat Launch Fees                Launch Fees        Boat launch ramp by the Flamingo marina NPS Photo     In addition to the park entrance fee, a boat launch fee is charged to all vehicles entering the park with boats, including canoes, kayaks, and power boats.  The per boat charges are: - 7 day boat launch fee - $25.00 - Annual boat launch pass - $60.00
